00020 
00021 #include <pthread.h>
00022 
00023 namespace boost
00024 {
00025 
00026 namespace detail
00027 {
00028 
00029 class lightweight_mutex
00030 {
00031 private:
00032 
00033     pthread_mutex_t m_;
00034 
00035     lightweight_mutex(lightweight_mutex const &);
00036     lightweight_mutex & operator=(lightweight_mutex const &);
00037 
00038 public:
00039 
00040     lightweight_mutex()
00041     {
00042 
00043 // HPUX 10.20 / DCE has a nonstandard pthread_mutex_init
00044 
00045 #if defined(__hpux) && defined(_DECTHREADS_)
00046         pthread_mutex_init(&m_, pthread_mutexattr_default);
00047 #else
00048         pthread_mutex_init(&m_, 0);
00049 #endif
00050     }
00051 
00052     ~lightweight_mutex()
00053     {
00054         pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_);
00055     }
00056 
00057     class scoped_lock;
00058     friend class scoped_lock;
00059 
00060     class scoped_lock
00061     {
00062     private:
00063 
00064         pthread_mutex_t & m_;
00065 
00066         scoped_lock(scoped_lock const &);
00067         scoped_lock & operator=(scoped_lock const &);
00068 
00069     public:
00070 
00071         scoped_lock(lightweight_mutex & m): m_(m.m_)
00072         {
00073             pthread_mutex_lock(&m_);
00074         }
00075 
00076         ~scoped_lock()
00077         {
00078             pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_);
00079         }
00080     };
00081 };
00082 
00083 } // namespace detail
00084 
00085 } // namespace boost
00086 
00087 #endif // #ifndef BOOST_DETAIL_LWM_PTHREADS_HPP_INCLUDED
